name: Pix4D Project
summary: Learn about .P4D files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: P4D files are created by the Pix4Dmapper program, which is part of the Pix4D suite. To create a P4D project, select New Project... then click Save Project or Save Project As.... To open a P4D project, select Open Project....

Pix4Dmapper allows you to process, analyze, and share images captured by a drone or other camera. The program uses images to generate digital surface, point clouds, texture models, terrain models, and textured models.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
